description: This file defines the CardPresenter class, which is responsible for creating, binding, and managing the display of recipe cards in an Android TV UI. It handles view creation, data binding from Recipe objects, and visual updates such as background color changes based on selection state.

classes.name: CardPresenter
classes.description: A presenter class for displaying recipe data as cards in an Android TV interface, managing view creation, data binding, and visual state updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes the view holder containing the card view, setting background colors and focusability.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Recipe object to the card view, setting title, difficulty, and image.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Clears images from the card view to free resources.

methods.name: updateCardBackgroundColor
methods.description: Updates the background color of the card view based on selection state.
